title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Ned Price on Today's Terrorist Attacks in Beirut, Lebanon | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
November 12, 2015

 



Statement by NSC Spokesperson Ned Price on Today's Terrorist Attacks in Beirut, Lebanon





The United States condemns in the strongest terms today's horrific terrorist attacks in Beirut, Lebanon that killed dozens and wounded hundreds more. We offer our deepest condolences to the families and other loved ones of those killed and injured in this violence. The United States will stand firm with the Government of Lebanon as it works to bring those responsible for this attack to justice.Â  Such acts of terror only reinforce our commitment to support the institutions of the Lebanese state, including the security services, to ensure a stable, sovereign, and secure Lebanon.
